resources.string: For info on Covid cases, enter a country, start date, and end date into the respective inputs. Ensure that the format of the date is \'YYY-MM-DD\'. Once query is entered, clicking the SEARCH button will take you to the Results page. You can see your saved data by clicking on the SAVED DATES button.
This page contains the results of your query. Clicking the SAVE RESULTS button will save your result and take you to the Saved Results page.
This page contains your saved queries. By clicking a saved query you will see the details of that query. By clicking and holding a query you will be prompted with an option to delete the query.
You are on the Search Page
You are on the Saved Queries Page
Do you want to save this query?
